page.title: 09TRANSPORT
page.content: Friday evening the last one leaves at 11.15 still a bit early for any entertainment.Most people here work in Glasgow so the Glasgow bus is very busy during the peak times when people are going to or returning from work.Otherwise the only people using the buses are school children going to school or O.A.Ps taking advantage of a cheap 12p ticket on off peak buses.The normal fare into Glasgow is 86p single adult fare although a 7 day weekly is available at Â£7.25 and a four week monthly ticket is Â£27.20.There are only 7 buses a day going to East Kilbride.The first one is at 7.12am and the last at 5.24pm.The cost of a single adult fare is 50p.On service as there were few people going to work by this bus.Quite a few people did however use it on a regular casual basis to go to the swimming pool
